title: Exploration 1770, reviewed 1970
creator_credit: Stanley Dalby, Tim Reid, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Contrasts Captain Cook’s observations on his voyage along the eastern coast of Australia in 1770 with scenes of the Royal Visit in 1970 and bicentenary celebrations including re-enactments of his landings. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Stanley Dalby, Tim Reid, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
